name: Digital Airways
tag_list: user-interface-solution, ui, embedded, mobile, user-experience, android, windows-mobile, touch-screen
overview:
Digital Airways is a provider of user interface software solutions and services for handheld devices, consumer electronics devices, and embedded systems.

Deployed on millions of devices world-wide, Digital Airwaysâ€™ UI solutions enable manufacturers and ODMs to create customizable user experiences with short time-to-market and low integration costs.

Digital Airways user interface solutions allow for the creation and implementation of customized user experiences such as touch screen functions, drag and drop, multi-windows and widgets across a range of platforms for mobile and embedded environments - Android, Windows Mobile, Apple, Linux, Symbian, Windows CE, etc. The solutions enable the integration of any 3rd party application - inlcuding graphic engines, handwriting recognition, predictive text, Flash and SVG.

Devices benefitting from Digital Airways’ UI solutions and services range from mobile phones, medical equipment, set-top boxes, personal media players, electronic payment terminals to infotainment systems for cars and airplanes.
